name: Asunder
description:
In this Demo, three strangers awake trapped inside a single body, with no recollection of how this came to be. Your quest is for them to permanently Asunder, Along the way you explore an Open world, Enter Dungeons, Slay Creatures, Collect Loot. All the major Hits in this darkly humorous fantasy Action RPG. Every night the Faceless will attack the main town killing the towns folk, You can construct defences to help out.
The Full game should be out in about 6 months, I'm releasing now a short demo to get some feedback.

KEY FEATURES

  • Switch between the party members depending on the situation, Also for a limited time you can Asunder when all your party fights together to bring down a specifically difficult foe.
  • Its real-time but you have the ability to pause and also view the scene from three different camera viewpoints, 1. Isometric, 2. A Birds eye view, 3. Behind the player
  • The ability to Craft Items, Cast Spells, Control Power Runes, Hire Mercenaries
  • There are numerous dungeons scattered throughout the map
